definition: the practice of treating somebody or a particular group in society less fairly than others
the ability to judge what is good, true, etc.
the ability to recognize a difference between one thing and another; a difference that is recognized
a vehicle with special equipment, used for taking sick or injured people to a hospital
the act of keeping something in good condition by checking or repairing it regularly
the act of making a state or situation continue
the money needed for somebody's living expenses; the act of providing this money
money that somebody must pay regularly to their former wife, husband or partner, especially when they have had children together
better in quality than somebody/something else; greater than somebody/something else
higher in rank, importance or position
showing by your behaviour that you think you are better than others
of very good quality; better than other similar things
a simple picture that is drawn quickly and does not have many details
a short funny scene on television, in the theatre, etc.
a short report or story that gives only basic details about something
to take control of a country or city and its people by force
to defeat somebody, especially in a competition, race, etc.
to succeed in dealing with or controlling something
to become very popular or successful in a place
a chemical element. Technetium is found naturally as a product of uranium or made artificially from molybdenum.
(in the past) a religious person who lived alone and avoided other people
a person who performs difficult acts such as balancing on high ropes, especially at a circus
the food and drink that you eat and drink regularly
a limited variety or amount of food that you eat for medical reasons or because you want to lose weight; a time when you only eat this limited variety or amount
a large amount of a limited range of activities
the time during which a machine, especially a computer, is not working
the time when somebody stops working and is able to relax
to break a promise, an agreement, etc.

a person or a company that designs and creates new products
a chemical substance that is used for developing photographs from a film
without hiding any feelings, opinions or information
the person or thing that makes something happen
a reason for having particular feelings or behaving in a particular way
an organization or idea that people support or fight for
a case that goes to court
worth doing, because it is helping other people
in order to support or defend something
to be united with somebody about something that you both agree on, believe in or wish to achieve
a chemical element. Terbium is a silver-white metal used in lasers, X-rays and television tubes.
a woman who is the head of an abbey of nuns
the act of taking somebody away illegally, especially using force
to think something is going to happen in the future; to know about something before it happens
the way in which two people or things are not like each other; the way in which somebody/something has changed
the amount that something is greater or smaller than something else
a disagreement between people
to stop not being friendly and become friends again
a point that somebody wants to suggest is a difference when in fact it is not different at all
to have an important effect on somebody/something; to make somebody feel better
to have an effect/no effect on somebody/something
used to say that you think the differences between two things are not important
to agree to forget about your disagreements

used to show that something is interesting or unusual
used to emphasize how much difference there is between two things
a piece of music in which the main tune is repeated several times, sometimes forming part of a longer piece
a tall thin tower, usually forming part of a mosque, from which Muslims are called to prayer

a set of four people or things
a performance by two singers or musicians; a piece of music for two singers or players
the act of performing a play, concert or some other form of entertainment
the way a person performs in a play, concert, etc.
how well or badly you do something; how well or badly something works
the act or process of performing a task, an action, etc.
an act that involves a lot of effort or trouble, sometimes when it is not necessary
to become or to make something become paler or less bright
to disappear gradually
if a sports player, team, actor, etc. fades, they stop playing or performing as well as they did before
to be disappearing quickly
to behave in a way that does not attract any attention; to disappear or hide
too easily upset or offended
very easily offended

aware of and able to understand other people and their feelings
reacting quickly or more than usual to something
able to understand art, music and literature and to express yourself through them
easily offended or upset
that you have to treat with great care because it may offend people or make them angry or embarrassed
able to measure very small changes
a person in a court who has the authority to decide how criminals should be punished or to make legal decisions
a person who decides who has won a competition
a person who has the necessary knowledge or skills to give their opinion about the value or quality of somebody/something

not usual or not socially acceptable
being or becoming different from the normal type
unusually good
very unusual
different from what is usual or expected, especially in a way that worries somebody or is harmful or not wanted
a strong feeling of hating somebody/something, especially for moral reasons

rude and unkind; acting in a way that may hurt other people’s feelings
a puppet whose arms, legs and head are moved by strings
a swollen (= larger than normal) and painful area on your skin or in your body, full of a thick yellow liquid (called pus)
the fact of somebody being away from a place where they are usually expected to be; the occasion or period of time when somebody is away
the fact of somebody/something not existing or not being available; a lack of something
used to say that when you are away from somebody that you love, you love them even more
not present in a situation or place, when it is obvious that you should be there

tending to forget things, perhaps because you are not thinking about what is around you, but about something else

the fact of being extremely silly and not logical and sensible
connected with the Middle Ages (about AD 1000 to AD 1450)

to push or force somebody/something into a small space; to move into a small space with the result that it is full
to learn a lot of things in a short time, in preparation for an exam

a thing that is like a drum in shape, especially part of a machine

to behave in a different way from other people; to have different attitudes or ideas
a person who spends too much time studying
to be all around something/somebody
to move into position all around somebody/something, especially so as to prevent them from escaping; to move somebody/something into position in this way
to be closely connected with something/somebody
to choose to have particular people or things near you all the time
the empty space at the side of a written or printed page
the amount of time, or number of votes, etc. by which somebody wins something
the difference between the cost of buying or producing something and the price that it is sold for
an extra amount of something such as time, space, money, etc. that you include in order to make sure that something is successful

the part that is not included in the main part of a group or situation

the point at which something, especially something bad, may begin to happen

a strong, often exciting, quality
a sharp tone of voice, often showing anger
having the type of edge or edges mentioned

to be in a difficult situation where any mistake may be very dangerous
to start to come apart or to fail
very excited and giving your full attention to something

to make something less strong, less bad, etc.

existing in nature; not made or caused by humans
having little or no processing
normal; as you would expect

having an ability that you were born with
relaxed and not pretending to be somebody/something different
related by blood
born to parents who are not married
based on human reason alone
used after the name of a note to show that the note is neither sharp nor flat. The written symbol is (♮).

to choose a new name, a country, a custom, etc. and begin to use it as your own

to choose somebody as a candidate in an election; to choose somebody as your representative

a large sports ground surrounded by rows of seats and usually other buildings

the pay and other benefits that somebody gets from their employer

to increase in amount or number
when the sun, moon, etc. rises, it appears above the horizon
to become more successful, important, powerful, etc.
to get up from a lying, sitting or kneeling position
to end a meeting
if a sound rises, it becomes louder and higher
if the wind rises, it begins to blow more strongly
if a feeling rises inside you, it begins and gets stronger
if your colour rises, your face becomes pink or red because you are embarrassed
if hair rises, it stands up instead of lying flat
to begin to fight against your government or leader or against a foreign army
to be able to be seen above everything that is around
if land rises, it slopes upwards
a river rises where it begins to flow

to come to life again
to stand straight and tall in order to show that you are determined, powerful or important
somebody feels so angry about something that they feel physically sick
to become angry
usually used in orders to tell somebody to get out of bed and be active
a large round vegetable with thick orange skin. The seeds can be dried and eaten and the soft part inside can be cooked as a vegetable or in sweet pies.
